name: Loop Arena
description:
How to Play

Fight enemies with your sword and try not to get hit. Enemies are spawned every second in a 10 second loop. Every 10 seconds the loop gets more intense with more, stronger enemies. Try to get the highest score you can.

Enemies
  • Zombies (green) walk towards you.
  • Slimes (blue) walk towards you and jump every second.
  • Fireslingers (red) walk around and shoot fireballs every 2 seconds.
  • Wizards (purple) walk around, shoot tracking spells every 2 seconds, and teleport every 4 seconds.
Controls
  • WASD or Arrow Keys: Movement
  • Mouse: Swing sword
Tools Used
  • Eclipse + Custom Game Engine
  • Aseprite
  • Chiptone
